verses.verse: אַל־ <WH408> Nor תְּ֭קַנֵּא <WH7065> Be not thou envious בְּאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> men רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> against evil וְאַל־ <WH408> Nor [תִּתְאָו כ] (תִּ֝תְאָ֗יו <WH183> desire ק) לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become אִתָּֽם׃ <WH854> for

כִּי־ <WH3588> for שֹׁ֭ד <WH7701> destruction יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <WH1897> studieth לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> For their heart וְ֝עָמָ֗ל <WH5999> of mischief שִׂפְתֵיהֶ֥ם <WH8193> and their lips תְּדַבֵּֽרְנָה׃ <WH1696> talk
בְּ֭חָכְמָה <WH2451> Through wisdom יִבָּ֣נֶה <WH1129> builded בָּ֑יִת <WH1004> is an house וּ֝בִתְבוּנָ֗ה <WH8394> and by understanding יִתְכּוֹנָֽן׃ <WH3559> it is established

וּ֭בְדַעַת <WH1847> And by knowledge חֲדָרִ֣ים <WH2315> shall the chambers יִמָּלְא֑וּ <WH4390> be filled כָּל־ <WH3605> all ה֖וֹן <WH1952> riches יָקָ֣ר <WH3368> with all precious וְנָעִֽים׃ <WH5273> and pleasant
גֶּֽבֶר־ <WH1397> man חָכָ֥ם <WH2450> A wise בַּע֑וֹז <WH5797> [is] strong וְאִֽישׁ־ <WH376> yea a man דַּ֝֗עַת <WH1847> of knowledge מְאַמֶּץ־ <WH553> increaseth כֹּֽחַ׃ <WH3581> strength

כִּ֣י <WH3588> by בְ֭תַחְבֻּלוֹת <WH8458> For by wise counsel תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> thou shalt make לְּךָ֣ מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> thy war וּ֝תְשׁוּעָ֗ה <WH8668> [there is] safety בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> and in multitude יוֹעֵֽץ׃ <WH3289> of counsellors

רָאמ֣וֹת <WH7311> [is] too high לֶֽאֱוִ֣יל <WH191> for a fool חָכְמ֑וֹת <WH2454> Wisdom בַּ֝שַּׁ֗עַר <WH8179> in the gate לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יִפְתַּח־ <WH6605> he openeth פִּֽיהוּ׃ <WH6310> not his mouth
מְחַשֵּׁ֥ב <WH2803> He that deviseth לְהָרֵ֑עַ <WH7489> to do evil ל֝֗וֹ בַּֽעַל־ <WH1167> person מְזִמּ֥וֹת <WH4209> a mischievous יִקְרָֽאוּ׃ <WH7121> shall be called
זִמַּ֣ת <WH2154> The thought אִוֶּ֣לֶת <WH200> of foolishness חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> [is] sin וְתוֹעֲבַ֖ת <WH8441> [is] an abomination לְאָדָ֣ם <WH120> to men לֵֽץ׃ <WH3887> and the scorner
הִ֭תְרַפִּיתָ <WH7503> [If] thou faint בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day צָרָ֗ה <WH6869> of adversity צַ֣ר <WH6862> [is] small כֹּחֶֽכָה׃ <WH3581> thy strength

הַ֭צֵּל <WH5337> to deliver לְקֻחִ֣ים <WH3947> [them that are] drawn לַמָּ֑וֶת <WH4194> unto death וּמָטִ֥ים <WH4131> and [those that are] ready לַ֝הֶ֗רֶג <WH2027> to be slain אִם־ <WH518> Oh תַּחְשֽׂוֹךְ׃ <WH2820> If thou forbear

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If תֹאמַ֗ר <WH559> If thou sayest הֵן֮ <WH2005> See לֹא־ <WH3808> did not יָדַ֪עְנ֫וּ <WH3045> Behold we knew זֶ֥ה <WH2088> this הֲ‍ֽלֹא־ <WH3808> who תֹ֘כֵ֤ן <WH8505> it not doth not he that pondereth לִבּ֨וֹת ׀ <WH3826> the heart הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he יָבִ֗ין <WH995> consider וְנֹצֵ֣ר <WH5341> [it]? and he that keepeth נַ֭פְשְׁךָ <WH5315> thy soul ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> doth [not] he know וְהֵשִׁ֖יב <WH7725> [it]? and shall [not] he render לְאָדָ֣ם <WH120> to [every] man כְּפָעֳלֽוֹ׃ <WH6467> act

אֱכָל־ <WH398> eat בְּנִ֣י <WH1121> My son דְבַ֣שׁ <WH1706> thou honey כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֑וֹב <WH2896> because [it is] good וְנֹ֥פֶת <WH5317> and the honeycomb מָ֝ת֗וֹק <WH4966> [which is] sweet עַל־ <WH5921> unto חִכֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2441> to thy taste

כֵּ֤ן ׀ <WH3651> is thus דְּעֶ֥ה <WH3045> So [shall] the knowledge חָכְמָ֗ה <WH2451> of wisdom לְנַ֫פְשֶׁ֥ךָ <WH5315> [be] unto thy soul אִם־ <WH518> If מָ֭צָאתָ <WH4672> when thou hast found וְיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> [it] then there shall be אַחֲרִ֑ית <WH319> a reward וְ֝תִקְוָתְךָ֗ <WH8615> and thy expectation לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִכָּרֵֽת׃ <WH3772> shall not be cut off פ

אַל־ <WH408> not תֶּאֱרֹ֣ב <WH693> Lay not wait רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> O wicked לִנְוֵ֣ה <WH5116> [man] against the dwelling צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> of the righteous אַֽל־ <WH408> not תְּשַׁדֵּ֥ד <WH7703> spoil רִבְצֽוֹ׃ <WH7258> not his resting place

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שֶׁ֨בַע ׀ <WH7651> seven times יִפּ֣וֹל <WH5307> [man] falleth צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> For a just וָקָ֑ם <WH6965> and riseth up again וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> but the wicked יִכָּשְׁל֥וּ <WH3782> shall fall בְרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> into mischief

בִּנְפֹ֣ל <WH5307> falleth [אֹויְבֶיךָ כ] (אֹֽ֭ויִבְךָ <WH341> enemy ק) אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׂמָ֑ח <WH8055> Rejoice וּ֝בִכָּשְׁל֗וֹ <WH3782> when he stumbleth אַל־ <WH408> nay יָגֵ֥ל <WH1523> be glad לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH3820> and let not thine heart

פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or יִרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> see יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> God וְרַ֣ע <WH7489> afflict בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> affliction וְהֵשִׁ֖יב <WH7725> him and he turn away מֵעָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and אַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> his wrath
אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתְחַ֥ר <WH2734> Fret בַּמְּרֵעִ֑ים <WH7489> not thyself because of evil אַל־ <WH408> not תְּ֝קַנֵּ֗א <WH7065> [men] neither be thou envious בָּרְשָׁעִֽים׃ <WH7563> at the wicked

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> there לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no תִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become אַחֲרִ֣ית <WH319> For there shall be no reward לָרָ֑ע <WH7451> to the evil נֵ֖ר <WH5216> [man] the candle רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked יִדְעָֽךְ׃ <WH1846> shall be put out יְרָֽא־ <WH3372> affright אֶת־ <WH853>

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> thou the LORD בְּנִ֣י <WH1121> My son וָמֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king עִם־ <WH5973> are given שׁ֝וֹנִ֗ים <WH8138> not with them that are given to change אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתְעָרָֽב׃ <WH6148> [and] meddle

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פִ֭תְאֹם <WH6597> suddenly יָק֣וּם <WH6965> shall rise אֵידָ֑ם <WH343> For their calamity וּפִ֥יד <WH6365> the ruin שְׁ֝נֵיהֶ֗ם <WH8147> both מִ֣י <WH4310> and who יוֹדֵֽעַ׃ <WH3045> and who knoweth ס

גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These לַֽחֲכָמִ֑ים <WH2450> These [things] also [belong] to the wise הַֽכֵּר־ <WH5234> to have respect פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> of persons בְּמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <WH4941> in judgment בַּל־ <WH1077> is not טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> [It is] not good

אֹ֤מֵ֨ר ׀ <WH559> He that saith לְרָשָׁע֮ <WH7563> unto the wicked צַדִּ֪יק <WH6662> Thou [art] righteous אָ֥תָּה <WH859> you יִקְּבֻ֥הוּ <WH5344> curse עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> him shall the people יִזְעָמ֥וּהוּ <WH2194> shall abhor לְאֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> nations

וְלַמּוֹכִיחִ֥ים <WH3198> But to them that rebuke יִנְעָ֑ם <WH5276> [him] shall be delight וַֽ֝עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> and תָּב֥וֹא <WH935> shall come בִרְכַּת־ <WH1293> blessing טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> and a good
שְׂפָתַ֥יִם <WH8193> [his] lips יִשָּׁ֑ק <WH5401> [Every man] shall kiss מֵ֝שִׁ֗יב <WH7725> that giveth דְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> answer נְכֹחִֽים׃ <WH5228> a right

הָ֘כֵ֤ן <WH3559> Prepare בַּח֨וּץ ׀ <WH2351> without מְלַאכְתֶּ֗ךָ <WH4399> thy work וְעַתְּדָ֣הּ <WH6257> and make it fit בַּשָּׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> for thyself in the field לָ֑ךְ אַ֝חַ֗ר <WH310> and afterwards וּבָנִ֥יתָ <WH1129> build בֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1004> thine house פ

אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּהִ֣י <WH1961> not be a עֵד־ <WH5707> Be not a witness חִנָּ֣ם <WH2600> without cause בְּרֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> against thy neighbour וַ֝הֲפִתִּ֗יתָ <WH6601> and deceive בִּשְׂפָתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8193> [not] with thy lips

אַל־ <WH408> nay תֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> Say כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עָֽשָׂה־ <WH6213> not I will do לִ֭י כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> Thus אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> so to him as he hath done לּ֑וֹ אָשִׁ֖יב <WH7725> to me I will render לָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to the man כְּפָעֳלֽוֹ׃ <WH6467> according to his work

עַל־ <WH5921> by שְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> by the field אִישׁ־ <WH376> of עָצֵ֣ל <WH6102> the sluggard עָבַ֑רְתִּי <WH5674> I went וְעַל־ <WH5921> and by כֶּ֝֗רֶם <WH3754> and by the vineyard אָדָ֥ם <WH120> of the man חֲסַר־ <WH2638> void לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> of understanding

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold עָ֘לָ֤ה <WH5927> And lo it was all grown over כֻלּ֨וֹ ׀ <WH3605> completely קִמְּשֹׂנִ֗ים <WH2738> [and] nettles כָּסּ֣וּ <WH3680> had covered פָנָ֣יו <WH6440> the face חֲרֻלִּ֑ים <WH7063> with thorns וְגֶ֖דֶר <WH1444> wall אֲבָנָ֣יו <WH68> thereof and the stone נֶהֱרָֽסָה׃ <WH2040> thereof was broken down

וָֽאֶחֱזֶ֣ה <WH2372> Then I saw אָ֭נֹכִֽי <WH595> I אָשִׁ֣ית <WH7896> apply לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> care for רָ֝אִ֗יתִי <WH7200> I looked לָקַ֥חְתִּי <WH3947> upon [it and] received מוּסָֽר׃ <WH4148> instruction

מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> [Yet] a little שֵׁ֭נוֹת <WH8142> sleep מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> a little תְּנוּמ֑וֹת <WH8572> slumber מְעַ֓ט ׀ <WH4592> a little חִבֻּ֖ק <WH2264> folding יָדַ֣יִם <WH3027> of the hands לִשְׁכָּֽב׃ <WH7901> to sleep
וּבָֽא־ <WH935> come מִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> [as] one that travelleth רֵישֶׁ֑ךָ <WH7389> So shall thy poverty וּ֝מַחְסֹרֶ֗יךָ <WH4270> and thy want כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man מָגֵֽן׃ <WH4043> as an armed פ
